page.title: 19HISTORIC HOUSES
page.content: {Brogyntyn Hall}is the only estate house in our area. It is possibly {Gothic}because there are huge pillars outside it.{British Telecom}recently vacated the premises ,having used it for many years as offices in which to design the nations trunk telephone cable routes. It is boarded up and the once beautiful grounds have been neglected. {Extensions}have been added onto the building.One was built in 1825 and another in 1906. A new guttering and drainage system for the house bears the date 1825 and there is a pond that was built in 1911.
